title: Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know - Times Now
summary:
Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know

Date: Not specified Source: Times Now

Apple has requested to join Google in the ongoing antitrust case with the U.S. government, seeking to safeguard their lucrative partnership that makes Google the default search engine on Apple devices.

  • The deal, reportedly worth $20 billion annually, is critical to Apple’s business.
  • Apple claims that the association with Google ensures access to the most popular search engine for consumers.
  • Apple's entry into the antitrust case comes as Google faces pressures that may lead to its breakup.
  • The penalty phase is set for April 2025 and could reshape Apple and Google's partnership.
  • Analysts warn that losing the revenue-sharing deal could significantly impact Apple's finances.
“Should the partnership fall apart, it would harm the consumers who prefer Google’s product.”

This legal battle will determine if one of Silicon Valley's most lucrative collaborations can survive.
newTitle: Apple Joins Google In Antitrust Battle To Protect $20 Billion Search Deal: Key Things To Know

summary:

Source: Hindustan Times

OnePlus has recently reduced the price of the OnePlus 12 in India, just ahead of the anticipated launch of the OnePlus 13 series.

Discount Details

  • Original price for 12GB/256GB variant: Rs. 64,999; discounted price: Rs. 59,999.
  • Original price for 16GB/512GB variant: Rs. 69,999; discounted price: Rs. 64,999.
  • Potential savings of Rs. 7,000 through ICICI Bank or OneBank credit cards, making the price as low as Rs. 52,999.
  • Available colors: Silky Black and Emerald Green.

Should You Buy or Wait?

The OnePlus 12 remains a competitive flagship device despite the upcoming launch of the OnePlus 13. Buyers are faced with the decision to either purchase the discounted model or wait for the new release.

The OnePlus 13 is expected to offer significant upgrades including:

  • Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset
  • 6.82-inch 2K BOE AMOLED display
  • 6000mAh battery with 100W fast charging
  • 50MP periscope telephoto camera
  • Higher launch price expected around Rs. 67,000

Conclusion

If budget is a concern, the OnePlus 12's current discounted price makes it a worthwhile option, though waiting for the OnePlus 13 could provide access to the latest technology.

title: Goodbye third-party apps! WhatsApp’s new scanner feature lets you scan and share documents like a pro - The Financial Express
summary:
Scan and share documents directly in WhatsApp with its new scanner feature

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Financial Express

WhatsApp is rolling out a new feature that allows users to scan and share documents directly within the app, simplifying document sharing and potentially phasing out the need for third-party apps.

This feature is currently available for some users in the latest WhatsApp update (version 24.25.80) on iOS and will enhance the document sharing experience.

  • Users can open WhatsApp, select the sharing menu, and choose the document sharing option.
  • The camera feature allows for direct scanning of documents within the app.
  • Erase and edit scanned documents before sharing.
  • Options for cropping, adjusting contrast, and brightening scanned documents are included.
“The quality of the scan has been kept high in readability and clarity, making it suitable for professional use.”

In conclusion, this new feature is set to enhance both business and personal document sharing experiences on WhatsApp.
newTitle: WhatsApp Introduces In-App Document Scanner Feature for Seamless Sharing
